### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#10785](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/10785.html) (Serialization improvements by sipa)

If y
Could remove the tsan suppression for `fChecked` after a rebase.
Any reason to set this to false when copying?\n\nnit: Also, could rename the member to `m_checked`, since it is only used in one function on master.
Perform initialization in initialization list instead :-)
